capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it turns out that his lineage is quite interesting. Apparently, he has a condition called maculogy which affects the size of his pupils. I'm pretty sure this information is accurate, so I'd say I'm confident about it. It's not like I'm speculating or anything, I've got the facts right here.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of personality does maculogy have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Hagrid's love for his pets. He has such a special bond with them, and it's really endearing to see him care for them so deeply.
